\boxed{$\frac{\pi}{4}$}

\boxed{$\pi / 3$}

Now assume that we have a frictional force that is proportional to the velocity vector, such that the equation of motion is as follows

$$
\frac{d \vec{v}}{d t}=\vec{g}-\beta \vec{v}
$$
